expression.description: Common Expression Language (CEL) expression. Should be evaluated against state data. Must evaluate to true for retry to execute

interval.description: Specifies the amount of time between retries (ISO 8601 format)

multiplier.description: Multiplier value by which interval increases during each attempt (ISO 8601 time format)

maxAttempts.description: Maximum number of retry attempts. Value of 0 means no retries are performed

jitter.description: Absolute maximum amount of random time added or subtracted from the delay between each retry (ISO 8601 duration format)
